co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib
Class ObjectStores

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib.ObjectStores

public final class ObjectStores
extends Object

Utility for describing ObjectStore and similar datasets within application configuration.
